name: Martian Invasion (ALA Software)
overview: The world has exploded into a galactic battleground for the war-like advances of the Royal Martian Army. they have penetrated the inner-space paths used by most inter-galactic voyagers, wreaking havoc and destruction, and fear and loathing in their dreaded alien paths. You ship spots a Martian convoy and prepares to engage it in stellar battle. Your release the Defense Shield, and put the ship into hyper-space in standard Battle procedure. Teh martians spot you and blast off a round of laser fire. You dodge and return the round. Battle has begun.
